issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Maintain partition information in Union
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11991](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11991). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently it returns Partitioning::UnknownPartitioning(num_partitions) based on the sum of partition counts (if available) of the underlying inputs. In case of another partition scheme - such as hash partitioning, it would be better to keep that information available, so other optimizations could be used.
